answers.answer: Hi,many women with diabetes are able to get pregnant.Most important though for health of you and the baby are to have excellent blood sugar control when you are planning to get pregnant and during the pregnancy.You should talk to your doctor if you are planning to get pregnant and work to get the best control possible.
